message.raw:
tutorial.md edited online with Bitbucket.

I had a compilation error in Ubuntu 13.10.
Acording to this thread:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9391863/difference-between-shared-dynamic-cast-and-dynamic-pointer-cast

shared_dynamic_cast is deprecated, so I used dynamic_pointer_cast instead.
